trans-unit.source: Supports a trigger action that resumes a paused <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />.
trans-unit.target: Supporta un'azione di attivazione che riprende un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" />in pausa.

trans-unit.source: Use this class with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to resume a paused <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa classe con un <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> o <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> per Riprendi a paused <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> object can only resume a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that is paused and has no effect on a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> in any other state.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> l'oggetto è possibile riprendere solo un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> messo in pausa e non ha alcun effetto un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> in un altro stato.

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per essere in grado di sospendere, riprendere o controllare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> impostato in modo interattivo, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> proprietà di relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> e utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> oggetto (ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) di controllo da riferimento relativo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively controlled after it starts.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> di <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> non è specificato, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> non è possibile controllare in modo interattivo dopo l'avvio.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedura: utilizzare i trigger di evento per controllare un Storyboard dopo l'avvio](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard" />.
